column2: Allstate profit falls 47 pct as claims riseUPDATE 1-Allstate profit misses estimates as claims rise Aug 3 Home and auto insurer Allstate Corp's  quarterly profit missed analysts' estimate by a wide margin as the company paid out more in claims.  UPDATE 1-Allstate profit misses estimates as claims rise Aug 3 Home and auto insurer Allstate Corp's  quarterly profit missed analysts' estimate by a wide margin as the company paid out more in claims. Aug 3 Home and auto insurer Allstate Corp  reported a 47 percent fall in quarterly profit as the company paid out more in claims.UPDATE 1-Allstate profit misses estimates as claims rise Aug 3 Home and auto insurer Allstate Corp's  quarterly profit missed analysts' estimate by a wide margin as the company paid out more in claims.

column2: ADM says expects soy profit margin to fall in Brazil SAO PAULO
column3: Aug 3 Archer Daniels Midland Co  expects profit margin in Brazil's soy production to fall to 122.20 reais ($35.42) per hectare in the upcoming 2015/16 season from 539.03 reais in 2014/15
column4: the company's South America President Valmor Schaffer said at an event in Sao Paulo on Monday.

column2: AT&T; to bundle wireless service with DirecTV's pay-TV offeringsAT&T; to bundle wireless service with DirecTV's pay-TV offerings The No. 2 U.S. wireless carrier AT&T; Inc said it will bundle its wireless service with DirecTV's pay-TV offerings after the $48.5 billion deal was approved last month.  AT&T; to bundle wireless service with DirecTV's pay-TV offerings The No. 2 U.S. wireless carrier AT&T; Inc said it will bundle its wireless service with DirecTV's pay-TV offerings after the $48.5 billion deal was approved last month. column2: New U.S. airline group backs Gulf carriers in Open Skies dispute Aug 3 A challenge by U.S. airlines that accuses three Gulf carriers of distorting competition via government subsidies took another turn on Monday with the formation of a U.S. airline group that backs the Gulf-carriers' cause.

column2: European regulators ask Halliburton for more merger information-companyEuropean regulators ask Halliburton for more merger information: companyEU regulators suspend review of Halliburton

column2: Star Wars meets Uniqlo as Fast Retailing
column4: Aug 3 Fast Retailing Co Ltd's  Uniqlo clothing chain said on Monday that it was expanding its collaboration with Walt Disney Co to offer a wider range of products and that it would open a flagship store at the Florida Disney World's shopping complex next spring.

column2: Tyson Foods warns full-year profit may fall short of forecast Aug 3 Tyson Foods Inc
column4: warned it may not be able to achieve its profit forecast for the year ending September due to export disruptions in its beef business and high cattle costs.

column3: Aug 3 A handful of large U.S. online retailers including Wal-Mart Stores Inc and Amazon.com Inc have agreed to pay more than $300
column4: 000 in fines for selling realistic-looking toy guys to New York residents
